column5: I am hoping to redo the interior of my salmon boat this spring with 2 captains chairs and then bench seating down either side . Anywhere i am missing as far as places to buy? god they seem expensive at Bass pro, Cabalas and West marine. anyone have a hookup? or an old junk boat with some good seats?
I seem to remember seeing an ad for captains seats recently.  I think it was on Spoonpullers.
i saw them, guy emailed me pics not what i was looking for.  thanks.
Just did a quick search on Kijij using "boat parts" and there were a number of hits; might be worth checking out. Even if the seats need recovering; it'll likely be cheaper then all new?  Dan.
I had seats recovered one time, and my experience was that the seams leaked and the seat held water. I would suggest  getting new, or very good used.
Try C.A.S. Marine in Ayr Ont.   Their website has an online parts guide.    I will be buying my new seat there soon as their supplier is MFG in the U.S.A.  Not China  Regards
